Pacific Data Fale o Aotearoa

See data

Find data for and about Pacific people in Aotearoa

Improve Pasifika wellbeing in Aotearoa through better, data-informed decisions.

Brought to you by

Welcome to Pacific Data Fale o Aotearoa.

Kia orana, noa’ia, talofa lava, mauri, mālō e lelei, tālofa, ni sa bula vinaka, fakaalofa lahi atu, mālō ni and warm Pacific greetings.

Data empowers us: Fa’amaumauga e mafai ai ona faamalosia ai o tatou tagata Pasefika.

To work towards a better future for Pacific people in Aotearoa, we need to understand how and why the world is changing.

Data is a vital tool to help us understand, measure, manage, and assess issues and the impact of the changes we make.

Explore data about your community

Pacific Data Fale o Aotearoa brings together data, research and reports on Pacific people in Aotearoa. You can access data from reputable sources that is free for you to take and use.

Find data on Pacific health, education, wellbeing, and more. Read reports that contain data about Pacific people in NZ, Pacific data sovereignty, and other topics. We’ve also gathered a list of Pacific data experts and researchers to help give important context to data.

Explore topics and charts

See interactive charts, data sources, definitions, and how and why data was collected. Take and use charts and data for free.

Find experts

Check out our directory of Pacific data experts, analysts, thinkers, and networks.

Read reports and presentations

Get information that supports your use of data and provides a deeper understanding of Pacific life in Aotearoa through the lens of data

Find business figures

Explore data specific to your industries of work, workforce, and customer base.

Dig into jobs worked by Pacific people in Aotearoa

Our work is an important factor in our happiness and stability. Dig into the types of jobs worked by Pacific people in different areas of NZ, and their incomes.

Explore Pacific jobs
